languages.text: {n}Холодная улыбка касается губ дознавателя.{/n} "Коль Вольный Торговец пожелал{mf||а} тратить свое время на помощь той, что всеми своими деяниями подвергает сомнению волю Империума в этой части {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}... Я могу сделать вывод, что мы никуда не спешим. А значит, мне незачем пятнать подобными деяниями священные символы Инквизиции".

traits.locale_text: {n}Холодная улыбка касается губ дознавателя.{/n} "Коль Вольный Торговец пожелал{mf||а} тратить свое время на помощь той, что всеми своими деяниями подвергает сомнению волю Империума в этой части {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Коронуса{/g}... Я могу сделать вывод, что мы никуда не спешим. А значит, мне незачем пятнать подобными деяниями священные символы Инквизиции".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}A cold smile touches the Interrogator's lips.{/n} "If the Rogue Trader wishes to spend {mf|his|her} time helping someone whose every act is a challenge to the Imperium's will in this part of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}... I can only conclude that we are not anxious to be anywhere else. And so I have no reason to resort to similar acts, thereby sullying the sacred symbols of the Inquisition."
languages.original_text: {n}Холодная улыбка касается губ дознавателя.{/n} "Коль Вольный Торговец пожелал{mf||а} тратить свое время на помощь той, что всеми своими деяниями подвергает сомнению волю Империума в этой части {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}... Я могу сделать вывод, что мы никуда не спешим. А значит, мне незачем пятнать подобными деяниями священные символы Инквизиции".

I can only conclude that we are not anxious to be anywhere else. And so I have no reason to resort to similar acts, thereby sullying the sacred symbols of the Inquisition."

I can only conclude that we are not anxious to be anywhere else. And so I have no reason to resort to similar acts, thereby sullying the sacred symbols of the Inquisition."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}审讯官唇角露出了冰冷的微笑。{/n}“如果行商浪人打算花费来帮助某个人，而那个人的一举一动，都是在挑战帝国在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的意志……那我只能断定，行商浪人并不急于去任何地方。因此，我也没有任何理由采取任何类似的行动，玷污审判庭的神圣徽记。”
languages.original_text: {n}A cold smile touches the Interrogator's lips.{/n} "If the Rogue Trader wishes to spend {mf|his|her} time helping someone whose every act is a challenge to the Imperium's will in this part of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}... I can only conclude that we are not anxious to be anywhere else. And so I have no reason to resort to similar acts, thereby sullying the sacred symbols of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: {n}审讯官唇角露出了冰冷的微笑。{/n}“如果行商浪人打算花费来帮助某个人，而那个人的一举一动，都是在挑战帝国在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的意志……那我只能断定，行商浪人并不急于去任何地方。因此，我也没有任何理由采取任何类似的行动，玷污审判庭的神圣徽记。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los labios del interrogador esbozan una sonrisa fría.{/n} «Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente quiere dedicar su tiempo a ayudar a una mujer cuyos actos desafían la voluntad del Imperium en esta región de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}... solo puedo concluir que no tenemos prisa por estar en ninguna otra parte. Por lo tanto, no tengo motivos para recurrir a actos de ese tipo y mancillar los símbolos sagrados de la Inquisición».
languages.original_text: {n}A cold smile touches the Interrogator's lips.{/n} "If the Rogue Trader wishes to spend {mf|his|her} time helping someone whose every act is a challenge to the Imperium's will in this part of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}... I can only conclude that we are not anxious to be anywhere else. And so I have no reason to resort to similar acts, thereby sullying the sacred symbols of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los labios del interrogador esbozan una sonrisa fría.{/n} «Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente quiere dedicar su tiempo a ayudar a una mujer cuyos actos desafían la voluntad del Imperium en esta región de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}... solo puedo concluir que no tenemos prisa por estar en ninguna otra parte. Por lo tanto, no tengo motivos para recurrir a actos de ese tipo y mancillar los símbolos sagrados de la Inquisición».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターの唇に冷たい笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}のこの地域で帝国に逆らう行いをする者を助けるために、自由開拓者自らが時間を割くおつもりなのでしたら…不満はないと言わざるを得ませんね。それに、この神聖な異端審問庁のシンボルを汚してまで助ける理由もありません」
languages.original_text: {n}A cold smile touches the Interrogator's lips.{/n} "If the Rogue Trader wishes to spend {mf|his|her} time helping someone whose every act is a challenge to the Imperium's will in this part of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}... I can only conclude that we are not anxious to be anywhere else. And so I have no reason to resort to similar acts, thereby sullying the sacred symbols of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターの唇に冷たい笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}のこの地域で帝国に逆らう行いをする者を助けるために、自由開拓者自らが時間を割くおつもりなのでしたら…不満はないと言わざるを得ませんね。それに、この神聖な異端審問庁のシンボルを汚してまで助ける理由もありません」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un sourire froid flotte sur les lèvres de l'interrogateur.{/n} « Puisque {mf|le libre-marchand est prêt|la libre-marchande est prête} à perdre son temps en aidant une scélérate dont les moindres faits et gestes sont un affront à la volonté de l'Imperium dans cette partie des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g}... j'en conclus que nous ne sommes pas pressés de nous rendre utiles ailleurs. Par conséquent, je ne vois aucune raison d'employer de telles mesures au risque de bafouer les symboles sacrés de la Sainte Inquisition. »
languages.original_text: {n}A cold smile touches the Interrogator's lips.{/n} "If the Rogue Trader wishes to spend {mf|his|her} time helping someone whose every act is a challenge to the Imperium's will in this part of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}... I can only conclude that we are not anxious to be anywhere else. And so I have no reason to resort to similar acts, thereby sullying the sacred symbols of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire froid flotte sur les lèvres de l'interrogateur.{/n} « Puisque {mf|le libre-marchand est prêt|la libre-marchande est prête} à perdre son temps en aidant une scélérate dont les moindres faits et gestes sont un affront à la volonté de l'Imperium dans cette partie des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g}... j'en conclus que nous ne sommes pas pressés de nous rendre utiles ailleurs. Par conséquent, je ne vois aucune raison d'employer de telles mesures au risque de bafouer les symboles sacrés de la sainte Inquisition. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein kaltes Lächeln zeigt sich auf den Lippen des Interrogators.{/n} "Wenn {mf|der Freihändler seine|die Freihändlerin ihre} Zeit damit verbringen will, jemandem zu helfen, der nichts anderes tut, als in diesem Teil der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g} gegen den Willen des Imperiums zu handeln ... dann kann ich daraus nur schlussfolgern, dass wir es nicht eilig haben, irgendwo sonst zu sein. Und daher muss ich nicht auf ähnliche Tricks zurückgreifen und die heiligen Symbole der Inquisition beflecken."
languages.original_text: {n}A cold smile touches the Interrogator's lips.{/n} "If the Rogue Trader wishes to spend {mf|his|her} time helping someone whose every act is a challenge to the Imperium's will in this part of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}... I can only conclude that we are not anxious to be anywhere else. And so I have no reason to resort to similar acts, thereby sullying the sacred symbols of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein kaltes Lächeln zeigt sich auf den Lippen des Interrogators.{/n} "Wenn {mf|der Freihändler seine|die Freihändlerin ihre} Zeit damit verbringen will, jemandem zu helfen, der nichts anderes tut, als in diesem Teil der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g} gegen den Willen des Imperiums zu handeln ... dann kann ich daraus nur schlussfolgern, dass wir es nicht eilig haben, irgendwo sonst zu sein. Und daher muss ich nicht auf ähnliche Tricks zurückgreifen und die heiligen Symbole der Inquisition beflecken."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, soğukkanlılıkla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Madem Hür Tacir vaktini, yaptığı her işle {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik'te{/g} İmparatorluk'un iradesine çomak sokan birisine yardım etmeye harcamaya karar vermiş... O hâlde başka bir yerlere gitmek için hiç acelemiz yoktur. Hâliyle benim böyle bir numaraya başvurup Engizisyon'un kutsal sembollerine leke sürmem de gerekmiyordur."
languages.original_text: {n}A cold smile touches the Interrogator's lips.{/n} "If the Rogue Trader wishes to spend {mf|his|her} time helping someone whose every act is a challenge to the Imperium's will in this part of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}... I can only conclude that we are not anxious to be anywhere else. And so I have no reason to resort to similar acts, thereby sullying the sacred symbols of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu, soğukkanlılıkla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Madem Hür Tacir vaktini, yaptığı her işle {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik{/g}'te İmparatorluk'un iradesine çomak sokan birisine yardım etmeye harcamaya karar vermiş... O hâlde başka bir yerlere gitmek için hiç acelemiz yoktur. Hâliyle benim böyle bir numaraya başvurup Engizisyon'un kutsal sembollerine leke sürmem de gerekmiyordur."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
